articles.author: Lucy Domachowski
articles.title: I’m A Celeb’s AJ Pritchard can't keep his hands off girlfriend as they reunite - Mirror Online
articles.description: I’m A Celebrity star star AJ Pritchard and his girlfriend have reunited after he was voted out of the castle on Wednesday, alongside Olympic champion Sir Mo Farah
articles.content:
Im A Celebrity star AJ Pritchard has been snapped packing on the PDA while on supermarket run with his girlfriend Abbie Quinnen. 
The loved up pair were seen smooching outside a local petrol station… [+2485 chars]

articles.title: Matthew McConaughey and Russell Brand blast 'illiberal far left' for patronizing conservatives - Daily Mail
articles.description: The actors made the comments during a discussion about politics on Brand's Luminary podcast, Under The Skin, which was released earlier this week.
articles.content:

articles.title: I'm A Celebrity 'fix' accusation after viewers spot Jordan North comment - Chronicle Live
articles.description: Sharp viewers noticed Jordan North make an odd comment about AJ Pritchard's elimination earlier this week
articles.content:
